That said, the owner is kind and courteous.

So glad to see Joe‚Äôs on Uber Eats this has been by go to for years! Not only is their pizza the best but the customer service is impeccable! I ordered pizza from here cuz it was good one time on a casual pass by.

I wanted zeppolis and set that door dash out.

Delivered, but Joes didn‚Äôt deliver on the Zeps.  Whole reason i ordered the shebang in the first place. They looked super decent.

Pizzas mad good tho. For sure.  AND the lasagna. Whole load of Italian bread came with it too, like wow!

My mom loves their pizza. Great prices. Sadly on cash. Very friendly. Next time I‚Äôll send pictures. Was so hungry forgot to take.

Had the pleasure of meeting the man the myth the legend, Joe (jr) himself! Great guy, the kind that treats you like family from the moment you walk in. I was only visiting for the day and I‚Äôm so glad my first slice of NY pizza was from Joe‚Äôs, absolutely delicious and wonderful experience. When you mention OGs and classic don‚Äôt leave out Joe‚Äôs pizzeria . It‚Äôs been in the neighborhood for yearsssss everytime I go it reminds me how much the community appreciates this spot. Friends and family definitely gather here to enjoy the food and great company . You can‚Äôt go wrong with a classic slice and they definitely give that NY taste if you know what I mean  ! It‚Äôs a hit lol  ‚Ä¶beef Pattie with cheese and pepperoni a hit ‚Ä¶garlic knots drenched üëåüèæand if you have a sweet tooth you have options I‚Äôve had the fried Oreos, zeppole , chocolate chip cookies and cake pops . If your ever in the neighborhood definitely show them love ‚ù§Ô∏è they are also on delivery sites as well which I‚Äôm grateful for üôèüèæ

The vibe  is the classic nyc pizzeria I remember from the 90s growing up. Right when I walked in and smelled the pizza I knew it was gonna hit. We ordered a cheese pie and I recommend you sit there and enjoy the ambience and of course super delicious classic NYC slice!
Makes Excellent Pizza & other Food!!!
Nice place to go to buy pizza
Revisited Joe‚Äôs after my first slice there in 1977.  Still great pizza and great value after all these years.  Friendly as always.  Thanks Joe!

Joey always greats you with a smile. Best pizza in the neighborhood! Please bring back the cauliflower pizza though lol

You will not find a better pizza anywhere so stop in a grab a slice. Need more than a slice ? No problem. Check out one of their numerous other options as they're all good. I know because I've had them all üòÜ
Classic NY pizza joint
Muy delisiosa la pizza..
Been goin here my whole life, and it was never bad, the dudes working are like family now
The cashier is the best
Only cash! Very good pizza. The cheese pizza was 14$. They don't seem to hear you very well, so speak up. Also try to have almost the right amount of cash otherwise they don't accept it.
Grew up eating at this pizzeria. The recipe has remained the same. Everything is so good. The zeppoles are DELICIOUS!  Crispy on the outside  soft and fluffy on the inside.

I have been going to Joe's pizzeria for now 26 years, and I will have to say that this is the absolute BEST PIZZERIA in the neighborhood! You will absolutely love the food served here, service is always great and respectful, and the guys here have always made sure your food is made fresh or heated to your desire. I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THIS ESTABLISHMENT! You will not be disappointed!!

I've lived in this Neighborhood for 3 years. This is the first time that I've tried their pizza and I loved it. I had sausage and extra cheese. I went back two days later for a whole pie for $24. The owner gave me a free soda which was cool. I bought a kanish for a friend and he couldn't stop talking about how good it was for hrs.

Childhood pizzeria (I believe they opened the year I was born 1973)... All the food served there is delicious and the service is always top notch. Whenever I am in the old neighborhood I try to stop and get a slice Owned and operated by the same family all this time. It's awesome any time of the day. Hope to see them there for more years to come.

I've Visited Joe's pizza for over 30 years. I was served back when by the father & now I'm served by the sons. Great pizza. I live in Pennsylvania but I travel to my home town Brooklyn NY. When I go in town I always stop at Joe's. Yes their pizza & food is that good.

I ordered a Large extra cheese pie for me and my family and on the menu the price said $13 but when my husband went to pick it up he was charged$17. When he came home with the pizza the extra cheese wasn‚Äôt applied and the cheese actually‚Ä¶
Always fresh and delicious can't go wrong with Joe's

It's a family owned pizzeria. I've seen the children grow with mine. Very respectful n friendly atmosphere. The Pizza is delicious, not doughy. Its the best. My family  n friends come into town that's the 1st place they want go...Joe's  Pizzeria. üëç‚Ä¶
The best pizza in Eny 40+ years

Best pizza in Brooklyn. Friendly staff
Clean environment  modest prices. No skimping on the cheese! Multilingual staff. Joe the owner attentive to your needs. Always with a smile!!!

This place is the best, I‚Äôve been coming here for YEARS. Joe always hooks it up, the pizza is great, smells great when you walk near the establishment, and I can‚Äôt tell you how many people I‚Äôve recommended Joes too. I‚Äôll forever come here!
Excellent Pizza, excellent specials, still has that old school pizzeria look and feel when you step in the door! Joe is pleasant and makes the best chocolate chunk cookies. Highly recommend.
The pizza was HORRIBLE, it was so dry too much bread barley sauce. I got a dry throat after every bite. Zepalis tasted gross.
They have the best pizza in the neighborhood.
Talk about great pizza! My goodness! The best pizza in Brooklyn!

This place is a jewel in the neighborhood, the place has an outdated feel but it's nothing short of great pizza and with a 2 for $20 special you can't go wrong. I was pleased with the quality of taste and freshness this place is delivering‚Ä¶

This is my spot since I was a kid growing up around here. Now, every time I come to town... Joe's is my first stop to get some old fashioned NY style pizza üçï And beef patty with cheese and coco bread is EVERYTHING!!!
I've been a customer since a kid and they never disappoint best pizza in the East hands down

Joe's pizza is the place to buy pizza it's really good it's a family run business it's been there over 20 years I been coming hear since I was a child this is one of the fewest business that have been around for over 4 decades I tell‚Ä¶

This hidden Little Gem is in the heart of City Line Brooklyn it is without a doubt the best round pie (Neapolitan) in the neighborhood and probably Beyond it's not that they do anything special to this pizza it's very simple and very plain‚Ä¶

Great slices... didn't like the customer service.  I was just asked if that's all boss.... yet every customer behind me was asked how the day, are you you ok etc... not any hard feelings. I tend to forget it exists.  But thats my review.
Pizza was fresh. Really cheesy and crispy. Garlic knots needed a little salt but were soft and had lots of fresh garlic. My favorite part about this place is the price!
Joe the owner was super nice to us, we ordered for a birthday party. Food came with some extras and came fresh. Thanks Joe! Recommend for Sofive parties!
